title: Athletism — Skiing (Elite) — Phase 10: Peak & Performance Maintenance
equipment: Gym: squat rack, platforms, barbells, dumbbells, cables
Stationary bike/Wattbike, treadmill (incline), curved sprint track
goal: Express fitness on race days; micro‑dose intensity; neuromuscular touch.

warmup: Activation 8–10' (glute med, deep core, scapular control)
Landing mechanics: snap-downs, pogos, lateral snap-downs
main: Primer day: 3x(1' reactive ladder / 2' easy) + 3x5 hurdle hops
Short power: 3x2 clean pulls (light) + MB scoop toss 3x5
On‑snow: 1–2 short sections @race cadence; stop fresh

notes: Week 1: One rehearsal + one primer. Week 2: 48–72h taper window pre‑race.
